channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose kerb stone, potholes and road surface degradation., 16th September
item.description:
Cracking to the East hard verge. Cracking to the carriageway over the piers. Pothole and cracking to carriageway 3m North of pier. Patch repairs, potholes and cracking adjacent to the North joint. Damaged and displaced kerbs to the North West. Impact damage and leaning to street lamp at the South West corner. The loose kerb stone and potholes could have detrimental effect on the bridge expansion joints if they are not rectified .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road Junction, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Tarmac all torn up from continuous vehicles turning in this clos including big waste lorries, leaving holes in road. Needs to be patched up with tarmac again., 16th September
item.description:
Middle of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Horsbere Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
